description: Clipping of aromantic. Coined on the Internet in the 2010s.

adjectives.description: aro (comparative more aro, superlative most aro)

examples: For ace and aro people, the possibilities for diverse relationships are endless, despite how pop culture often brands our identity as restrictive and confined.

entries.meaning: (slang, neologism) A person who is aromantic.
examples: While aces and aros can often be a misunderstood demographic in the queer community and outside of it, information about our identities is making its way into more conversations.
